body_html: Is this just batch norm/instance norm with affine=False and using an Embedding to produce a weight and bias? If so then using the existing components would be simple enough, but I guess it is popular enough that a premade component would be nice.
body_text: Is this just batch norm/instance norm with affine=False and using an Embedding to produce a weight and bias? If so then using the existing components would be simple enough, but I guess it is popular enough that a premade component would be nice.
body: Is this just batch norm/instance norm with `affine=False` and using an `Embedding` to produce a weight and bias? If so then using the existing components would be simple enough, but I guess it is popular enough that a premade component would be nice.
